abstract: Embattled film executive David Bergstein has countersued hedge fund D.B. Zwirn, blaming the bankrupt firm for the lion’s share of his and business partner Ronald Tutor’s woes, The Hollywood Reporter said.

lead_paragraph: Embattled film executive David Bergstein has countersued hedge fund D.B. Zwirn, blaming the bankrupt firm for the lion’s share of his and business partner Ronald Tutor’s woes, The Hollywood Reporter said in an article posted to its Web site on Thursday.

headline.main: Embattled Movie Executive Sues Zwirn and Fortress
